content.raw: I was trying to fly the plane demo world, then after I pressing `W` for a long time, then pressing `D`, Gazebo crashed. Before that I had a lot of `Error [Param.cc:452] Unable to set value [inf inf -inf 0 0 0] for key[pose]` messages. I am not being able to reproduce the crash, but I always end up in a state where the plane is stuck at the world origin.
content.html: I was trying to fly the plane demo world, then after I pressing W for a long time, then pressing D, Gazebo crashed. Before that I had a lot of Error [Param.cc:452] Unable to set value [inf inf -inf 0 0 0] for key[pose] messages. I am not being able to reproduce the crash, but I always end up in a state where the plane is stuck at the world origin.
